name: co-pilot
description: Co-Pilot - Projet géré avec la méthode BMAD

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && node scripts/update-version.mjs patch
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && node scripts/update-version.mjs minor
scripts.version:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && node scripts/update-version.mjs major
scripts.release:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run version:tag
scripts.release:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run version:tag
scripts.release:major: npm run version:major && npm run version:tag

author: Malik Karaoui
